snippet: The brooding singer-songwriter Nathaniel Rateliff opens up a little in “Falling Faster Than You Can Run,” and the violinist Regina Carter focuses on her family roots in “Southern Comfort.”
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews Falling Faster Than You Can Run, latest album by singer-songwriter Nathaniel Rateliff; Nate Chinen reviews Southern Comfort, newest recording by violinist Regina Carter.

byline.original: By JON PARELES and NATE CHINEN

lead_paragraph: The brooding singer-songwriter Nathaniel Rateliff opens up a little in “Falling Faster Than You Can Run,” and the violinist Regina Carter focuses on her family roots in “Southern Comfort.”

headline.main: Nathaniel Rateliff and Regina Carter Release Albums
headline.print_headline: Nathaniel Rateliff and Regina Carter Release Albums
